frameset.edef: to clarify or purify, to look deeply in

example.parse: (TOP (S (NP-VOC (PRT (VOC_PART يا)) (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG سادَة)) (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ لَو) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1P تَمَحَّصنا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN أَعْضاء) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG الوِزارَة)) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG وِزارَة) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP الجَنْزُورِيّ)))))))) (VP (IV1P+IV نَجِد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (S (PP-PRD (PREP بِ) (NP (PRON_3FS ها))) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN العَجَب)))) (PUNC ,)))

arg.g: members of the ministry the ministry of Aljanzury
